subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Olympic Games (2014)
Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: The death of Nodar Kumaritashvili on the eve of the Vancouver Games amplified earlier warnings about safety that Olympic organizers would do well to heed.
snippet: The death of Nodar Kumaritashvili on the eve of the Vancouver Games amplified earlier warnings about safety that Olympic organizers would do well to heed.
